content: ग्रंथ् {c1c} {c9c} <ab>P.</ab> {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> (ग्रंथति, ग्रथ्नाति, ग्रंथयति-ते, also ग्रथति, ग्रथते) {@--1@} To fasten, tie or string together; <ls>Bk. 7. 105</ls>; स्रजो ग्रथयते &c. {@--2@} To arrange, class together, connect in a regular series. {@--3@} To wind round. {@--4@} To write, compose; ग्रथ्नामि काव्यशशिनं विततार्थरशिंम <ls>K. P. 10.</ls> {@--5@} To form, make, produce; ग्रथ्नंति बाष्पबिंदुनिकरं पक्ष्मपंक्तयः <ls>K. 60</ls>; <ls>Bk. 17. 69.</ls> {@--6@} To set or strew with.
